org.kuleuven.esat.graphicalModels

KernelBayesianModel

abstract class KernelBayesianModel extends LinearModel[FramedGraph[Graph], Int, Int, DenseVector[Double], DenseVector[Double], Double, CausalEdge[Array[Byte]]] with KernelizedModel[DenseVector[Double], DenseVector[Double], Double, Int, Int]

Abstract class implementing kernel feature map extraction functions.

Linear Supertypes

  6. def applyFeatureMap(): Unit

    Apply the feature map calculated by the using the Kernel to the data points and store the mapped features in the respective data nodes.

  7. def applyKernel(kernel: SVMKernel[DenseMatrix[Double]], M: Int = math.sqrt(npoints).toInt): Unit

    Implements the changes in the model after application of a given kernel.

    Implements the changes in the model after application of a given kernel.

    It calculates two things

    1) Eigen spectrum of the kernel

    2) Calculates an approximation to the non linear feature map induced by the application of the kernel

    kernel

    A kernel object.

    M

    The number of prototypes to select in order to approximate the kernel matrix.

    Definition Classes
    KernelBayesianModel → KernelizedModel
